title: Developing Sustained Mathematical Learning Competencies Through Digital Learning Space Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Mathematical Concepts and Practical Experience in Primary Education
context.additional_context: Emphasizing the competency of practicing elementary teachers to sustainably utilize digital learning spaces in smartphone-centric limited technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can participate in sharing and discussing mathematical educational materials at least three times a week using an asynchronous learning platform.
Learners can maintain an attendance rate of over 80% by combining real-time lectures (synchronous) and recorded lectures (asynchronous).
Learners can complete a virtual class design project in a digital environment and receive peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
